attributes.action: review the decision to remove the duty differential in the March 2010 budget in order that British motorists that have already purchased an E85 flexfuel vehicle can continue to refuel with E85 and make considerable CO2 savings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government looks set to remove the special duty measure for E85 biofuel, 85% Ethanol and 15% unleaded (from fossil fuels).
Saab would like the Government to rethink its decision which will not only penalise green minded motorists, but will also impact those forward thinking companies that have made a move to installing and using this fuel.
